pages.text: Like its little brother the $(l:components/air_canister)Air Canister/$, the $(thing)Reinforced Air Canister/$ holds air and can be charged and discharged in a $(l:machines/charging_station)Charging Station/$. However, it has an increased volume of 6000mL and can be charged to 20 bar (it won't explode).

An interesting use for the $(thing)Reinforced Air Canister/$ is as a bulk air storage device, in conjunction with an inventory such as a chest and a $(l:tubes/pressure_tubes)Pressure Tube/$ with a $(l:tubes/charging_module)Charging Module/$. This can get even more interesting with an $(l:machines/aerial_interface)Aerial Interface/$ and a (vanilla) $(thing)Ender Chest/$...
